postCreateCommand: wget -q -O openrefine.tar.gz https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/releases/download/3.7.7/openrefine-linux-3.7.7.tar.gz && tar --exclude 'licenses' --exclude 'LICENSE.txt' --exclude 'licenses.xml' --exclude 'README.md' -xzf openrefine.tar.gz --strip 1 && rm openrefine.tar.gz && wget https://github.com/opencultureconsulting/orcli/raw/main/orcli && chmod +x orcli && ln -s "${PWD}/orcli" ~/.local/bin/
